Title: Joseph: King of Dreams
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Biography, Drama, Family, History, Musical
Writer: Eugenia Bostwick-Singer (screenplay), Raymond Singer (screenplay), Joe Stillman (screenplay), Marshall Goldberg (screenplay)
Actors: Ben Affleck, Mark Hamill, Richard Herd, Maureen McGovern
Plot: A prophet who has the ability to interpret dreams is sold into slavery in Egypt, where people learn of his gifts.
